## Assignment

### Part 1 - Reading for next class

Read Teaching More by Grading Less (or Differently), by Jeffrey Schinske and Kimberly Tanner. Then submit a comment in the "Assignment 8 Discussion" post on Ed.

### Part 2 - Exam Question Upload

Upload an example exam question given in the class that you teach. It can be one that was given this semester, or in a previous semester. Upload this question to bCourses, in the assignment labeled "Assignment 8 - Exam Question Upload." Do not upload an entire exam, just pick a single question.
